      • fillRandom

        public void fillRandom()

      • fillRandom

        public void fillRandom(int numPads,
                       int numObstacles,
                       int numTeleportal)
        Firstly, Iterate over grid cell to choose for each cell whether it is free, pressure pad, obstacle or teleportal. Secondly, Iterate over the free cells and the pressure pad cells to choose for each cell whether a rock, robot or nothing will be positioned.
        Parameters:
        numPads - Number of pressure pads.
        numObstacles - Number of obstacles.
        numTeleportal - Number of teleportals.
